column1: The build seems to be just some terrain or I think it might be part of a nether fortress because of the colours. It has an exploding feature, to activate push down on the smooth lava without studs and a 2x4 brick pops off. The could of made it a 2x6 brick but 2x4 is fine. They have grown mushroom on the terrain, some fire and some soul sand. They have some pouring lava and magma blocks near the lava just like the game does. It has some space underneath the terrrain which I think is a bit big.
This is a great sets with lots of play value. I think kids will love it. I don&rsquo
column2: t have much complaints except with the big gap underneath the terrain. I hope you like my review more will come since the new 2019 sets are nearly on shelves in Western Australia!
